resource.description: The AWS::S3::AccessGrantsLocation resource is an Amazon S3 resource type hosted in an access grants instance which can be the target of S3 access grants.

properties.name: IamRoleArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the access grant location's associated IAM role.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the access grant location's associated IAM role.

properties.name: LocationScope
properties.description: Descriptor for where the location actually points

type.description: Descriptor for where the location actually points

attributes.description: The AWS::S3::AccessGrantsLocation resource is an Amazon S3 resource type hosted in an access grants instance which can be the target of S3 access grants.

properties.name: AccessGrantsLocationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified Access Grants location.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified Access Grants location.

properties.name: AccessGrantsLocationId
properties.description: The unique identifier for the specified Access Grants location.

type.description: The unique identifier for the specified Access Grants location.
